title: How Do You Carry an ARAM game?
body:
1 good player can't support 4 mediocre ones.

I've been suffering so many losses lately, when I'm doing my job well (I mostly tank).

But even when I try to carry...
https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/195997757/200439361?tab=overview
I had more dmg to champs than the rest of my team combined, this does not want to make me play more LoL.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=a grub,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=B8a41YWH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-28T04:41:46.907+0000)
>
> from 8000 aram games i have alot to say, do you have discord or anything? i rather not type it all out

I only have 7500 ARAM games, teach me senpai.

Sorry, this was a poke at bots in ARAM.
I apologise for being too subtle.

I mean from experience the games i tend to carry hard are the ones that i'm an ADC, as that is basically the best role to carry with on ARAM (due to always being in teamfight's, burst is less relevant because you can only burst 1 person generally, whereas ADC's Can dps everyone.
I would start by playing with some friends. In the game you listed it's pretty much you're on your own vs 2 humans on the enemy team. If the 2 humans know to focus you, the game is up.

Range, hp, and Cc. Whichever team has more of this, will have a higher chance of winning. ARAM is a gamble though, both in teammates AND in gameplay. You can't really plan, or do much about it. But there's one thing you can do. 

Control both the middle bushes. They're really helpful because the enemy can't see what's in there.

Also Sion is an instawin (in my experience) on this mode due to his rediculous cc and health. Once you reach level 16, ult into their nexus towers for the rest of the game and watch them call you a tryharder and playing to win. They either block you,(and die) or they let you go and lose the game.

It really depends on which champs your team rolls vs what the enemy has. Certain champs are more 'OP' and suited for ARAM in my opinion. So use that reroll option if you can't play the champ you've been given or try to swap it.
